website_summaries.verdict: Stylish and warm, this faux-down “puffer” jacket is both practical and street wear – befitting at an unbeatable price.
pros: Great variety of colors to choose from
Tests well for warmth by reviewers who live in subfreezing weather
Repels a fair amount of water and this synthetic down keeps you warmer in wet conditions than real down
cons: While a perfect fit for most, too big for others

customer_reviews.title: Runs big
customer_reviews.text: I’m 5.9 and 190 pounds and I like a loose fit this jacket fits me perfect with three T-shirts underneath. This is a large....
customer_reviews.author: Tuna Poker

customer_reviews.title: DON'T BUY THIS..LEAKS LINT
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy this product. The jacket "leaks" lint. The outer cloth material looks good but is of very bad quality. The stitches at the seam also are very poor quality. Aittle stretching can cause inside lint/cotton to come out. I exchanged the jacket thinking maybe that particular piece was defective. But the exchanged item had the exact same issue. Did not expect this from a company like Columbia. The jacket was a perfect fit but they cut corners and used cheap materials/bad sticthes.
customer_reviews.author: sunny

customer_reviews.title: Great Jacket!
customer_reviews.text: It's always a risk ordering clothing online if you haven't tried it on first. I was taking a bit of a gamble with this jacket, but it seems to have paid off. It's very warm for when the tempature outside is in the 20's and the fit is quitr good. I'm a thin 6'0 male and found that a medium works well and fits my long arms. I love the front zip pockets! I kinda wish there was a simple hood, but that's me being picky.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Smith

customer_reviews.title: A PERFECT & VERY WARM, SLEEK FIT JACKET!!! (LOOKS HOT ON HIM TOO :)
customer_reviews.text: My husband LOVES this coat! Even in -5 windchills, hub has been warm when taking us sleigh riding for a couple of hours at a time. The warmest, yet slickly thin jacket he has ever owned. I am glad I went with this than the all traditional down version. This looks good, is nicely fitted. Hub is 165-170 lbs (approx) and 5'7 and 1/2 inches tall. Medium was PERFECTO! Fit great, looks awesome & high quality! I plan on it lasting him for years to come!
customer_reviews.author: Twinpossible

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value/quality/style proposition!
customer_reviews.text: Great mid weight/warmth/looks puffer. Good for ~ 40 F with a few med shirts of layers........~30F with heavy fleece layer and same few shirts, doing light activity...eg casual walk. I'm 6'2'', 180 lb andX L fits perfect to be worn either of former two ways.The two hem elastic adjustments are a necessity to assure draft free/heat retaining qualities, and quit surprised to see this feature missing on many others like puffers. Plus, Columbia is a great value proposition...........above average quality for a few bucks more than inferior generic outerwear. For example, the shell/outer, is nylon, more expensive and far more durable than polyester shells......key if you any kind of activity ie it will last!
customer_reviews.author: glenn b

customer_reviews.title: Great jacket. Very warm and fit great
customer_reviews.text: Great jacket. Very warm and fit great. Light to travel with. Kept my Florida born husband warm in Chicago! He is 6’1” and 250 pds
customer_reviews.author: Betty Lambley

customer_reviews.title: Nice jacket but runs a little big

customer_reviews.author: Maggie C.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent jacket!!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome jacket! I am a 5'11", 205 lbs male... I purchased an XL and it fit perfect! Not tight, not baggy. It is a Columbia jacket and the quality represents the name brand very well. This jacket is excellent workmanship! I can't say enough great things about it! Definitely recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: j_m1964

customer_reviews.title: Amazing jacket

I like the elastic cuffs at the end of sleeves.The seller shipped very quickly. I am very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sonny

customer_reviews.title: Great coat, very warm!
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a gift for my husband for Christmas. He loves it and wears it everyday. I also like the look of it, although my husband does have to wear a rain jacket over this coat if it's raining (due to the lack of a hood). We've had to wash it twice and had no issues; still looks brand new.

product_meta.title: Columbia Men's Frost Fighter Insulated
product_meta.description: Toasty warmth for frigid climates this faux-down men's jacket seals out arctic temps with 150 gram of synthetic insulation and shed water with an Omni-shield shell fabric, while the Frost fighter's traditional down-style baffling lends a timeless, versatile style.
feature_bullets: Shadow Ripstop: 100% Nylon; 100% Polyester; Synthetic Down: 100% Polyester
ADVANCED TECHNOLOGY: This winter jacket features Omni-Shield water and stain repellent shell fabric and 100% polyester synthetic down for ultimate warmth and protection.
HANDY FEATURES: This men's winter down jacket features two zippered hand pockets and an abrasion resistant chin guard.
ADJUSTABLE FEATURES: This men's insulated down jacket features binding at cuffs and drawcord adjustable hem for customizable comfort.
VERSATILE FIT: This winter jacket's down-style baffling lends a timeless, versatile fit.
